Package server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HTMLResponse
    The class extends Response class and implements the HTTP Response for an HTML file.
    HTTPSocket
    Wrapper class for each connection.
    ImageResponse
    Class to handle HTTP response objects carrying an image
    Invocation
    Invocation class implements calling of methods during runtime.
    JsonBuilder
    JsonBuilder class to build json objects item by item and also build them as a String to make it easy to send as HTTP Response
    Properties
    Server properties
    Request
    HTTP Request class
    Resource
    Resource class which acts as replacement of template during HTML templating
    Response
    Base class of HTTP Response object
    Route  
    RouteMap
    Implements variable routing
    Server
    Implements TCP Threading server Creates a master thread which in turn creates worker threads to handle each client connection
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Controller
    Classes identified by this annotation act as HTTP Request handlers for that particular URL
    MethodHandler
    All methods inside a Controller class which are annotated by this annotation represent Handler methods for particular type of request (GET, POST, etc.)
